display.title: Basic Ore Washing Plant
description: This machine combines washing for simple automation, but also advanced and precise washing for byproducts.
Washing a &&aCrushed Ore&&r will grant a &&aPurified Ore&&r which can be refined further, some useless stone, and more importantly, the first &&6Byproduct&&r!
Any Ore will give at &&9minimum 2/3rd of a Dust&&r of this Byproduct through washing. Prioritize this step the most.
Using Distilled Water over Water cuts recipe duration in half, but it's also more difficult to produce.
